article.title: DASS1
article.paragraph: Digital Access Signalling System 1(DASS1) is aproprietary protocoldefined byBritish Telecomto provideIntegrated Services Digital NetworkISDNservices in theUnited Kingdom. It is now obsolete, having been replaced byDASS2. This too will become obsolete over the coming years asQ.931, aEuropeanstandard, becomes widely adopted in theEuropean UnionEU.
